name: Takaduki's planet
description:
Have you ever heard the story of the gold haired prince from the asteroid known as B-612? This story is not about him. This is about a little indian, who lives in an asteroid pretty similar to that one. Probably in the neighborhood

Takaduki likes flowers, and to manage her geysers. Her asteroid is like the mix of the Yellowstone and Iceland. There are nice pine trees, geysers and some lovely common lupinus. 

But she has to manage the eruptions of her geysers. Nature forget it's job... And the pine trees are nice, but too many can be dangerous.
